price: "Idan Ka azabta su, to lalle ne su, bãyinKa ne, kuma idan Ka gãfarta musu, to, lalle ne Kai ne Mabuwayi Mai hikima."
arabic: إِن تُعَذِّبۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ عِبَادُكَۖ وَإِن تَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ فَإِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in tuʿadhib'hum fa-innahum ʿibāduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
